name: Bubblemilk Pie
desc: An innovative stuffed dessert. Crispy puff pastry, creamy filling, and the surprising sensation of bubbles bursting in sequence... This post-meal treat brings satisfaction to every taste bud. Remember to enjoy it while it's warm!

customize.name: Recipe: Bubblemilk Pie
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Bubblemilk Pie

customize.name: Delicious Bubblemilk Pie
customize.desc: An innovative stuffed dessert. This sweet indulgence begins with a crisp crackle of golden crust. Warm filling then cascades across your palate as bubbles meet and pop between your teeth, taking you on a journey across an unending spectrum of textures... This is the perfect finale to any feast!

customize.name: Suspicious Bubblemilk Pie
customize.desc: An innovative stuffed dessert. The bursting bubbles send waves of pain across your tongue â€” combined with the imagery of their green and crispy coatings, the experience is not unlike cramming exploding Dendro Cores into your mouth...

customize.name: Bubblemilk Pie
customize.desc: An innovative stuffed dessert. Crispy puff pastry, creamy filling, and the surprising sensation of bubbles bursting in sequence... This post-meal treat brings satisfaction to every taste bud. Remember to enjoy it while it's warm!

customize.name: Milk
customize.desc: Sweet and fragrant cow's milk. Don't waste a single drop, not even that one rolling down your chin.

customize.name: Flour
customize.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

customize.name: Butter
customize.desc: An extract from milk. With the appropriate application, it can bring rich aromas to even the most basic ingredients.

customize.name: Sugar
customize.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

value.text: Increases all party members' DEF by 200 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
